PlantChicago

Plant!Chicago is a grassroots non-profit that oversees educational programs and community involvement for The Plant, which is housed in a giant warehouse in Chicago's Back of the Yards neighborhood. The goal of Plant!Chicago is to build and promote sustainable closed-loop systems in its community.

The identity was released at PlantChicago's annual fundraiser, along with new T-Shirts designs. The building illustration is by Chicago-based artist and illustrator Lizi Breit.
